name: Camomile Cranberry Green Milk Tea
description: This Camomile Cranberry Green Milk Tea combines the soothing qualities of camomile with the tangy kick of cranberry and the rich creaminess of milk powder for a comforting and health-conscious beverage. Perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet, this tea is a delightful addition to any healthy lifestyle.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the mug of water until hot but not boiling.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Steep the Twinings tea bag and Cranberry Green Tea bag in the hot water for about 3-5 minutes depending on desired strength.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the tea bags and stir in the milk powder until fully dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Camomile Cranberry Green Milk Tea immediately while warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
